# Peer-graded Assignment: Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project

This repository contains the following files:

 - This README.rmd file
 - An R script called run_analysis.R
 - A codebook.rmd file that describes the variables, the data, and any transformations and work performed to clean up the data.
 - A mean_activity.csv file containing the tidy data set.
 
 The link to the Github repository with the script for performing the analysis and the listed files are as follows: https://github.com/shyhhantan/DataClean
 
The work submitted for this project is the work of the student who submitted it.
